程序包 com.springleaf.cloud.discovery.condition

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    IConditionFactory
    Get the IRouter and IMatcher based on the specified rule language，see SimpleConditionFactory Developers can extend this factory method to implement custom rule language implementations
    IMatcher
    Conditional matching rules, such as for service registration scenarios for example:host=192.168.* Use in the service registry predicate,see GenericRegisterConditionPredicate
    IRouter
    Conditional routing rules, such as service routing and service discovery scenarios,for example: host=192.168.* & region=3502 => host=192.168.10.1
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AbstractConditionSupport
    Abstract Simple condition that supports conditional routing rules and Conditional matching rules, such as: 1) Conditional routing rules, such as service routing and service discovery scenarios,for example: host=192.168.* & region=3502 => host=192.168.10.1 2) Conditional matching rules, such as for service registration scenarios,for example: host=192.168.* See the online documentation for details see ConditionMatcher see ConditionRouter
    AbstractConditionSupport.MatchPair
    match pair
    ConditionFactoryBuilder
    ConditionFactory Builder Get the IConditionFactory implementation according to the configured rule language
    ConditionMatcher
    Get ConditionMatcher with IConditionFactory
    ConditionRouter
    Get ConditionRouter with IConditionFactory
    MatchUtils
    Created by zhangliang on 2019-07-12.
    SimpleConditionFactory
    Default ConditionFactory
    SpELPlaceholderResolver
    Conditional rules support SpEL expressions and are applicable to dynamic parameter routing scenarios
